If you or your company are interested in to hiring me to teach data science workshops or if you need help with a particular data science project, I'm available for short-term consulting!

The kinds of services I offer include:

**Workshops on**

Programming:

- R

- Python

- SQL

- Git/GitHub

- Shell/UNIX

Doing data science:

- Data cleaning

- Data visualization

- Data science workflows

Workshops can be just a few hours, 1-2 days, or be split up into shorter sessions recurring over several weeks. They can also be remote or in-person, depending on location.


**Data science consulting**

I also offer short-term help with:

- Creating impactful data visualization

- Developing a consistent data science workflow

- Preparing complex data for analysis

- Creating an analysis plan

- and more!


Interested? Feel free to email me at rlbarter at gmail dot com to see if your needs might be a good fit for my services!
